title: Riot I got a friend to join but he already wants to leave your game thanks to the BE system
body:
I just got a friend into league and he's asking me how to get BE. I feel scummy when I have to tell him that the only way is to disenchant champion shards contained in champion capsules and you don't get it simply from winning a match.  How the hell does anyone expect to get new players into this game with a flawed ass system that forces players to open their wallets for a champion they want? 

Is this company not rich enough already to let players earn BE after winning matches?
